alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 8:02AM CDT until May 28 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Low lying farmland and other rural land floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:31 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 23.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to 27.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat 1pm 1pm 1pm Marais Des Cygnes River La Cygne 25.0 23.5 Thu 7am 24.9 27.3 20.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
